View Menu

Contact Us

Hours

The Honors College Office and Facilities are open Monday through Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.

Location

The Honors College is located on the first floor of Burnham Hall. View the UIC Campus Map to find our location.

1st Floor of Burnham Hall
828 S. Halsted Street (MC 204)
Chicago, Illinois  60607

General Inquiries

Main Office: 312-413-2260
Fax: 312-413-1266
Email: hcollege@uic.edu

Advertising

If you'd like to advertise to the Honors College student community, please complete the announcement request form. Please note that all announcements must be relevant and suitable for Honors College dissemination and should be submitted at least 2-3 days in advance.

Submit a Question
